verses.verse: <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> "The <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> <S%H6437>facing<s%> <S%H6921>east<s%> shall be <S%H5462>shut<s%> the <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H4639>working<s%> <S%H3117>days;<s%> but it shall be <S%H6605>opened<s%> on the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> and <S%H6605>opened<s%> on the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2320>new<s%> <S%H2320>moon.<s%>

"And the <S%H5387>prince<s%> shall <S%H935>enter<s%> by <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> from <S%H2351>outside<s%> and <S%H5975>stand<s%> by the <S%H4201>post<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate.<s%> Then the <S%H3548>priests<s%> shall <S%H6213>provide<s%> his <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> and his <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H8002>offerings,<s%> and he shall <S%H7812>worship<s%> at the <S%H4670>threshold<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> and then <S%H3318>go<s%> out; but the <S%H8179>gate<s%> shall not be <S%H5462>shut<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

"The <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> shall also <S%H7812>worship<s%> at the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of that <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> on the <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%> and on the <S%H2320>new<s%> <S%H2320>moons.<s%>

"And the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H5387>prince<s%> shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> on the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall be <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>blemish<s%> and a <S%H352>ram<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>blemish;<s%>

and the grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> shall be an <S%H374>ephah<s%> with the <S%H352>ram,<s%> and the grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> with the <S%H3532>lambs<s%> as <S%H3027>much<s%> as he is <S%H3027>able<s%> to <S%H4991>give,<s%> and a <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%> with an <S%H374>ephah.<s%>

"And on the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2320>new<s%> <S%H2320>moon<s%> [he shall offer] a <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H6499>bull<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>blemish,<s%> also <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%> and a <S%H352>ram,<s%> [which] shall be <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>blemish.<s%>

"And he shall <S%H6213>provide<s%> a grain <S%H4503>offering,<s%> an <S%H374>ephah<s%> with the <S%H6499>bull,<s%> and an <S%H374>ephah<s%> with the <S%H352>ram,<s%> and with the <S%H3532>lambs<s%> as <S%H3027>much<s%> as he is <S%H5381>able,<s%> <S%H3027><s%> and a <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%> with an <S%H374>ephah.<s%>

"And when the <S%H5387>prince<s%> <S%H935>enters,<s%> he shall <S%H935>go<s%> in by <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> and <S%H3318>go<s%> out by the same <S%H1870>way.<s%>

"But when the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> at the <S%H4150>appointed<s%> <S%H4150>feasts,<s%> he who <S%H935>enters<s%> by <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> to <S%H7812>worship<s%> shall <S%H3318>go<s%> out by <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H8179>gate.<s%> And he who <S%H935>enters<s%> by <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> shall <S%H3318>go<s%> out by <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H8179>gate.<s%> <S%H3808>No<s%> one shall <S%H7725>return<s%> by <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> by <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H935>entered<s%> but shall <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>straight<s%> out.
"And when they <S%H935>go<s%> in, the <S%H5387>prince<s%> shall <S%H935>go<s%> in <S%H8432>among<s%> them; and when they <S%H3318>go<s%> out, he shall <S%H3318>go<s%> out.

"And at the <S%H2282>festivals<s%> and the <S%H4150>appointed<s%> <S%H4150>feasts<s%> the grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> shall be an <S%H374>ephah<s%> with a <S%H6499>bull<s%> and an <S%H374>ephah<s%> with a <S%H352>ram,<s%> and with the <S%H3532>lambs<s%> as <S%H3027>much<s%> as one is <S%H3027>able<s%> to <S%H4991>give,<s%> and a <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%> with an <S%H374>ephah.<s%>

"And <S%H3588>when<s%> the <S%H5387>prince<s%> <S%H6213>provides<s%> a <S%H5071>freewill<s%> <S%H5071>offering,<s%> a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H8002>offerings<s%> [as] a <S%H5071>freewill<s%> <S%H5071>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H6437>facing<s%> <S%H6921>east<s%> shall be <S%H6605>opened<s%> for him. And he shall <S%H6213>provide<s%> his <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> and his <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H8002>offerings<s%> as he <S%H6213>does<s%> on the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%> Then he shall <S%H3318>go<s%> out, and the <S%H8179>gate<s%> shall be <S%H5462>shut<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he <S%H3318>goes<s%> out.

"And you shall <S%H6213>provide<s%> a <S%H3532>lamb<s%> a <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>blemish<s%> for a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3117>daily;<s%> <S%H1242>morning<s%> by <S%H1242>morning<s%> you shall <S%H6213>provide<s%> it.

"Also you shall <S%H6213>provide<s%> a grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> with it <S%H1242>morning<s%> by <S%H1242>morning,<s%> a <S%H8345>sixth<s%> of an <S%H374>ephah,<s%> and a <S%H7992>third<s%> of a <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%> to <S%H7450>moisten<s%> the <S%H5560>fine<s%> <S%H5560>flour,<s%> a grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%> by a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H2708>ordinance.<s%>

"Thus they shall <S%H6213>provide<s%> the <S%H3532>lamb,<s%> the grain <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and the <S%H8081>oil,<s%> <S%H1242>morning<s%> by <S%H1242>morning,<s%> for a <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering.<s%>"

<S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H3588>"If<s%> the <S%H5387>prince<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> a <S%H4979>gift<s%> [out of] his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> to <S%H376>any<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> it shall <S%H1961>belong<s%> to his <S%H1121>sons;<s%> it is their <S%H272>possession<s%> by <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>

"But <S%H3588>if<s%> he <S%H5414>gives<s%> a <S%H4979>gift<s%> from his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> to <S%H259>one<s%> of his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> it shall be his <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H1865>liberty;<s%> then it shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H5387>prince.<s%> His <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> [shall be] <S%H389>only<s%> his sons'; it shall <S%H1961>belong<s%> to them.

"And the <S%H5387>prince<s%> shall not <S%H3947>take<s%> from the <S%H5971>people<s%>'s <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> <S%H3238>thrusting<s%> them out of their <S%H272>possession;<s%> he shall <S%H5157>give<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> from his own <S%H272>possession<s%> <S%H4616>so<s%> that My people shall not be <S%H6327>scattered,<s%> <S%H376>anyone<s%> from his <S%H272>possession.<s%>"' "

Then he <S%H935>brought<s%> me through the <S%H3996>entrance,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> [was] at the <S%H3802>side<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> into the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H3957>chambers<s%> for the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> which <S%H6437>faced<s%> <S%H6828>north;<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> [was] a <S%H4725>place<s%> at the <S%H3411>extreme<s%> <S%H3411>rear<s%> toward the <S%H3220>west.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H2088>"This<s%> is the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> shall <S%H1310>boil<s%> the <S%H817>guilt<s%> <S%H817>offering<s%> and the <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering,<s%> [and] <S%H834>where<s%> they shall <S%H644>bake<s%> the grain <S%H4503>offering,<s%> in order that they may not <S%H3318>bring<s%> [them] out into the <S%H2435>outer<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> to <S%H6942>transmit<s%> <S%H6942>holiness<s%> to the <S%H5971>people.<s%>"

Then he <S%H3318>brought<s%> me out into the <S%H2435>outer<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> and <S%H5674>led<s%> me <S%H5674>across<s%> to the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H4740>corners<s%> of the <S%H2691>court;<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> in <S%H4740>every<s%> <S%H4740>corner<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%> [there was] a [ small] <S%H2691>court.<s%>

In the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H4740>corners<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%> [there were] <S%H7000>enclosed<s%> <S%H2691>courts,<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> [cubits] <S%H753>long<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H7341>wide;<s%> these <S%H702>four<s%> in the <S%H9525>corners<s%> [were] the <S%H259>same<s%> <S%H4060>size.<s%>

And [there was] a <S%H2905>row<s%> [of masonry] <S%H5439>round<s%> <S%H5439>about<s%> in them, <S%H5439>around<s%> the <S%H702>four<s%> of them, and <S%H4018>boiling<s%> <S%H4018>places<s%> were <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H2918>rows<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> <S%H5439>about.<s%>

Then he <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H428>"These<s%> are the <S%H1310>boiling<s%> <S%H1004>places<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H8334>ministers<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> shall <S%H1310>boil<s%> the <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of the <S%H5971>people.<s%>"
